## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                              | Type                  | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `dense`  | `dense`   | Optional, styles the density of the list, making it appear more compact. | `boolean`             | `false`     |
| `size`   | `size`    |                                                                          | `"medium" \| "small"` | `undefined` |
